name: It is Happening Again
description:
A Twin Peaks fangame set after, during, and before the events of the series, focusing on the sad life of Annie Blackburn. The narrative loops and intersects around a woman struggling to exist in two worlds at once. There is no real ending, although you may find something close to it.

Feeling the weight of other trapped souls around her, Annie calls out for Cooper, listens for Laura, and tries to ground herself in one world or another. With very little luck.

Created as part of the Femme so Fatal Zine - a tribute to women in horror.

Roughly 4500 words long.
Content warnings for mentions of suicide, abuse, and violence.
Newer systems may find that entering fullscreen mode makes the screen too big - if this happens you can tab in and out of fullscreen by hitting F.
